content: a pair of cute crochet pumpkins to bring some fall magic into your home decor the pdf contains written pattern for both pumpkins as well as a recipe type of instructions to make a pumpkin of any size you wish there is also a link to full video tutorial on how to make the pumpkin from start to finish including sewing up and stuffing materials for smaller pumpkin i used dishie worsted weight 190 yards /174 m per 100g ball 100% cotton x 1 ball in sunbaked clay 29501 for larger pumpkin i used scheepjes merino soft 50% merino wool 25% microfibre 25% acrylic 105m 115yds per 50g 1 8oz ball 1 balls in van gogh 641 4 and 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stuffing of your choice hot glue gun branch stick or cinnamon stick finished size the smaller pumpkin measures 23 5 cm circumference x 10 5 cm height from top middle to bottom middle the larger pumpkin measures 32 cm circumference x 13 5 cm height from top middle to bottom middle if you would like to keep up with my latest free crochet patterns and would like to be notified when they are live on the blog sign up to my newsletter https //view flodesk com/pages/5fa1d2fe2a5607446aea4c09 blog https //bluestarcrochet
